Desc: you can use *globalstats to view the bot's global stats! It has some cool info. Try it out!
you can suggest me bets! Join the discord server. Use *discord!
you can view news about the bot! Use *news!
you don't have to at all, but you can support the bot using the command *patreon! I really appriciate it.
you and your friend have an argument? Settle it down with a VS bet! Be in the same game and do *VsBet (ping the person you want to challenge)!
